author: trustin
msg: * Added SimpleIoProcessorPool which provides common simple round-robin distribution of IoProcessors
* Made all IoProcessor implementations public so that SimpleIoProcessorPool can access them
* Changed all acceptor and connector implementations to accept IoProcessor (including SimpleIoProcessorPool), which natually resolves the 'shared I/O processors' issue.
Resolved issue: DIRMINA-316 (Manual shutdown of I/O worker threads and Selectors)
* Added IoService.dispose() - calling dispose releases all resources as soon as possible.
* Added IoProcessor.dispose() to propagate the disposal request

author: ruwan
msg: Fixing an issue with samples guide
